title: What are 5 examples of non-moral standards in your community? Why are they considered non- moral standards? - Quora

response.answer_text: These have nothing to do with Moral Choices: Standards of WeightStandards of MeasureIEEE Standards of Software TestingStandard sizes of DoorwaysStandard sizes of Airplane seatsI see no necessary connection to any Moral Choices or Moral Dilemmas. There are many other similar examples.

‎Abdul Rahman Luai (عبدالرحمن لؤي)‎'s answer to Can an atheist be morally good? Is it possible to be completely benevolent without being a religious believer? My standard for judging morality is my objective morality of Islam. Maybe the link above will help you understand.
